_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate billing/subscription copy

page.title: Page title for billing management. Ex: 'Billing', 'Subscription', 'Plans & Billing'
page.description: Page description explaining what user can do here. Ex: 'Manage your subscription and billing details'

subscription.subscription: Section heading for subscription info. Ex: 'Subscription', 'Your Plan'
subscription.currentPlan: Subheading or description of current plan section. Ex: 'Your current plan and billing information', 'Active subscription'
subscription.noSubscription: Message when user has no active subscription. Don't be negative. Ex: 'You don't have an active subscription.', 'No plan selected yet'
subscription.viewPlans: Button to see available plans. Ex: 'View Plans', 'See Pricing', 'Choose a Plan'
subscription.manageSubscription: Button to Stripe Customer Portal. Ex: 'Manage Subscription', 'Update Billing'
subscription.renewsOn: Label showing renewal date. Include {date} placeholder. Ex: 'Renews on {date}', 'Next billing: {date}'
subscription.trialEnds: Label showing trial end date. Include {date} placeholder. Create urgency gently. Ex: 'Trial ends on {date}'
subscription.cancelsOn: Label showing when subscription ends after cancellation. Include {date} placeholder. Ex: 'Cancels on {date}', 'Access until {date}'

payment.paymentMethods: Section heading for payment methods. Ex: 'Payment Methods', 'Billing Details'
payment.invoices: Section heading for invoice history. Ex: 'Invoices', 'Billing History'
payment.paymentFailed: Warning message when last payment failed. Be helpful, not alarming. Ex: 'Your last payment failed. Please update your payment method to continue your subscription.'

features.includedFeatures: Section heading listing what's included in current plan. Ex: 'Included Features', 'What you get', 'Your benefits'
